text:
You could put this in your [global .gitignore](https://help.github.com/articles/ignoring-files/#create-a-global-gitignore). Files coming from your editor or IDE are more specific to you and you would want the ignore rules to apply to every repository that you edit.
Repository gitignore files better for language specific or generated files that everyone editing the repository will want to ignore.
